net.hudup.core.client

Interface Gateway

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Balancer, DefaultServer, ExternalServer, Listener, PowerServerImpl

    public interface Gateway
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    For security, each server should implements this interface so that authenticated remote application (client) can retrieves itself and its service.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Server getRemoteServer(java.lang.String account, java.lang.String password)
      Retrieving remote server with authentication of account and password.
      Service getRemoteService(java.lang.String account, java.lang.String password)
      Retrieving remote service with authentication of account and password.

    • Method Detail

      • getRemoteServer

        Server getRemoteServer(java.lang.String account,
                       java.lang.String password)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving remote server with authentication of account and password.
        Parameters:
        account - authenticated account.
        password - authenticated password.
        Returns:
        remote Server with authentication of account and password.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • getRemoteService

        Service getRemoteService(java.lang.String account,
                         java.lang.String password)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retrieving remote service with authentication of account and password.
        Parameters:
        account - authenticated account.
        password - authenticated password.
        Returns:
        remote Service with authentication of account and password.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.
